ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Item Dropping/Trading (was: minotaur horn change?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... heh, i have a level 52 druid buddy on fennin and we are semi-powerlevelling (sln/chloro only) our trio of cleric/monk/enchanter.  but for pure power
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:03 PM 6/2/00 -0400, you wrote:
>So you need a level 52 druid to power level, I went to my local power
>leveling market andgot me one of fancy Level 52 Vicars to help. No wonder
>I was so confused when I leveled at the same rate as before.... Bard
>melee is not good enough to abuse the free healing of the cleric.
>
>Treilanin Loreweaver
>Bard of the 39th song
>Karana

heh, i have a level 52 druid buddy on fennin and we are semi-powerlevelling (sln/chloro only)
our trio of cleric/monk/enchanter. but for pure power levelling, it's tough to beat chloroplast/
sln/thorns. and the bonus of powerlevelling with a druid is that your offense/defense/weapons
skills will all stay maxed as you power level which isn't the case with some other power levelling
methods like having a warrior beat up a mob then zone and let the guy getting powerlevelled
finish it off.
